docs.snippet: Pete Carroll, who coached Seattle to a Super Bowl victory, received a three-year contract extension....

docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; Seattle Seahawks give coach Pete Carroll a three-year contract extension through the 2016 season; other football news noted.

headline.print_headline: Seahawks Sign Carroll Through 2016; the Titans Release Their Top Rusher

docs.snippet: Northwestern football coach Pat Fitzgerald sided with his university against the formation of a players union in his first public comments Saturday, repeating what he already told his team: "I believe it's in their best interests to vote no."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Northwestern football coach Pat Fitzgerald sided with his university against the formation of a players union in his first public comments Saturday, repeating what he already told his team: "I believe it's in their best interests to vote no."

headline.main: Wildcats' Fitzgerald Urges 'No' Vote on Union
headline.print_headline: Wildcats' Fitzgerald Urges 'No' Vote on Union

docs.snippet: Bundesliga champions Bayern Munich suffered their first league defeat in 18 months when they slumped to a 1-0 loss at Augsburg on Saturday as Sascha Moelder's first-half strike ended their record 53-game unbeaten league run....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bundesliga champions Bayern Munich suffered their first league defeat in 18 months when they slumped to a 1-0 loss at Augsburg on Saturday as Sascha Moelder's first-half strike ended their record 53-game unbeaten league run.

headline.main: Bayern Slump to First League Loss in 18 Months
headline.print_headline: Bayern Slump to First League Loss in 18 Months
